name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DocHero: ChatGPT Powered AI Writing Companion

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your writing with one click for any audience, in customizable tone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DocHero is an AI-powered writing companion that understands what you‚Äôre trying to say, and rephrases text to a customizable tone. 
 
With DocHero, writing an academic paper or business writing is no longer a pain

Powered by our advanced AI technology that has a deep understanding of context and semantics, DocHero goes far beyond the grammar and writing assistants you already know, offering completely new capabilities: 
 
üîÆ  Rewrite - Explore fresh ways to express yourself in writing. Rewrite suggests alternative ways to phrase your text, whether it's the entire sentence, phrase or just a single word. 

‚úçÔ∏è Tone - Depending on your goal, you can choose the tone in which your rewrite suggestions will be written. Want your message to be a bit more casual? More concise? No problem! Rewrite helps you convey your message with the phrasing you like the most.
 
üîç Translate and Rewrite simultaneously - Write a sentence or part of a sentence in a foreign language, and when you select Rewrite, you will receive rephrasing suggestions in English. The feature is particularly useful for non-native English speakers.

üöÄ Cross-language - you can input any language, and choose an output language, and the outcome, and DocHero will work.

If free daily usage is not enough, you can purchase additional usage at https://www.docheroai.com/upgrade. We‚Äôre constantly working on updates and improvements to make your DocHero experience even better. If you have questions or feedback, we would love to hear from you at tong.chen@docheroai.com.
